snippet: The instrument in focus this year is the saxophone, and as usual the winner will receive a $25,000 music scholarship, a recording contract with the Concord Music Group and one of the most prestigious honors available to an emerging jazz musician.
abstract: The instrument in focus this year is the saxophone, and as usual the winner will receive a $25,000 music scholarship, a recording contract with the Concord Music Group and one of the most prestigious honors available to an emerging jazz musician.
